author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Which podcasts does Adam Savage recommend? Does Adam make YouTube videos that he wants to make or that he thinks will do well? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members Movidude and HexLex, whom we thank for their support! What podcasts are you listening to right now?

00:00 Movies 
04:28 Podcasts
07:48 YouTube

Going Rogue: https://www.goingroguepodcast.com/
If Books Could Kill: https://www.ifbookspod.com/
5-4 Pod: https://www.fivefourpod.com/
You're Wrong About: https://yourewrongabout.com/
Criminal: https://thisiscriminal.com/
Ologies: https://www.alieward.com/ologies
You Must Remember This: https://www.youmustrememberthispodcast.com/
Fixing the Biggest Problem With Mechanical Keyboards: https://youtu.be/N3FEv1qw4_w
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.yout
title: Does Tested Make Content Decisions Based on Profit or Fun?
